nodes.text: Tractor Beam 12 was a tractor beam control unit on board the Death Star. When a YT-1300 light freighter named the Millennium Falcon was captured by the station's tractor beam, Obi-Wan Kenobi, who was the passenger of the ship, turned off the device in order to allow the Falcon to escape.
Tractor Beam 12 first appeared in Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope. The text on the tractor beam was displayed in English, however, it was replaced with Aurebesh in the 2004 DVD release.
